Sentencas: In most solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) designs the Ni-based anode acts as an effective catalyst for internal reforming.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, there are some SOFCs, e.g. segmented-in-series cells or ceramic anode cells, in which the anode may be less effective for internal reforming.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to test this case, we have studied SOFCs supported on a thick ceramic layer.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While these cells worked well with hydrogen fuel, the performance with propane-air mixtures was poor.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of a Ru-CeO2 catalyst layer to the support surface yielded much better performance in propane-air.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The catalyst promoted propane partial oxidation at temperatures : >= 500 degrees C without carbon formation.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Gas diffusion limitations for the reformed fuel limited the performance at high temperature, e.g., approximate to 0.5 W/cm(2) at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results are discussed based on calculated gas diffusion rates for different possible reaction pathways.
Titulo: Use of a catalyst layer for propane partial oxidation in solid oxide fuel cells
